message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product that I think you'd be really interested in. I'm asking for $95, but I'm open to negotiating.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

Bob, I appreciate your interest. $85 is a good offer, but I'm still hoping to get a bit closer to my asking price. Would you be willing to go up to $90? It's a fair price for the value you'll get from this product.
I understand your perspective, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $90. Would you be willing to meet me at $87? I'm willing to compromise, but I'm trying to stay within my budget.
